programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: Meskada
programme.desc: After a home burglary results in the murder of a young boy, a small town detective is called in to solve the case, one that has galvanized an entire community around the victim's politically powerful mother. Nick Stahl, Rachel Nichols and Kellan Lutz star in this crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior

programme.title: Episode 207
programme.desc: The persecution of the Catholic Church reaches its pinnacle as Thomas Cromwell confiscates its wealth for the crown, making Henry the richest English king in history, while Katherine dies in pious poverty(c)

programme.title: Episode 208
programme.desc: The brief resurgence of Anne at court is short-lived, as Jane Seymour rapidly replaces her in the king's affections, a process speeded up by Henry's near-fatal jousting accident and Anne's hysteria-induced miscarriage(c)

programme.title: Sexquerade Ball
programme.desc: A couple with a feisty sex life decide to take a break after a big fight -- but after a series of erotic experiments with others, they find they still need each other after all. Will they be able to reunite at the masquerade ball?

programme.title: The Nasty Show Volume II Hosted by Brad Williams
programme.desc: Comedian Brad Williams hosts part two of the most deranged minds in comedy, including Bobby Slayton, Corey Holcomb, Paula Bel, Mike Ward, Yamaneika and Ralphie May in a hilarious show where no subject is too taboo

programme.title: Bad Company (1995)
programme.desc: An icy new recruit (Laurence Fishburne) at a shadowy paramilitary outfit is making the company's normally unflappable co-owner (Ellen Barkin) very nervous in this crime thriller costarring Frank Langella, Michael Beach, Gia Carides, David Ogden Stiers and Daniel Hugh Kelly

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: Will (Landon Liboiron) is a young man harboring a secret crush on pretty classmate Eliana (Lindsey Shaw) and even bigger secret about his past: he's the son of a werewolf and may have supernatural gifts of his own. When a mysterious attack reveals that a werewolf army is being assembled by someone from his past, he's torn between his true nature and his love for Eliana. This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

programme.title: No No: A Dockumentary
programme.desc: A documentary about infamous no-hitter Dock Ellis who threw for the Pittsburgh Pirates in the 70s and was embroiled in controversy on and off the field, and later become a trailblazer for a new wave of civil rights. Features intimate stories and a trove of archival footage to reveal the man behind the legend

programme.title: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: From legendary filmmaker Steven Spielberg comes an epic film that chronicles the untold story of the final four months of the man regarded as America's greatest President. Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as the commander-in-chief of a country in chaos: a man with moral courage and a progressive thinker who challenged the status quo. Featuring an all-star cast including Sally Field, Tommy Lee Jones and James Spader

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: Horror about a woman who emerges alone from the Appalachian cave system where she encountered unspeakable terrors and is forced to return to the subterranean depths to help locate her missing friends. As the rescue party goes deeper into uncharted caverns, nightmarish visions of the past begin to haunt her and she must fight for survival and redemption

programme.title: Drug War
programme.desc: A Chinese-Hong Kong crime thriller about a police captain who teams up with a drug manufacturer to go undercover so that he can bust a notorious drug lord but finds himself drawn into a dangerous battle of wits

programme.title: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: After his baby son is born, chronic underachiever Tom Reilly (Zach Braff) is suddenly forced to grow up and take a job working in his father-in-law's advertising agency after his wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) elects to leave her career as a lawyer. One little wrinkle: Sofia's seemingly perfect, wheelchair-bound ex-boyfriend (Jason Bateman) also works for the same company, and immediately sets about undermining Tom at every turn. Charles Grodin, Mia Farrow and Donal Logue costar in this comedy cult favorite

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: Born To Be Blue
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke stars as jazz legend Chet Baker in this biopic that zeroes in on a key moment in the 1960s, just as the all-but-washed-up musician attempts to stage a comeback, spurred in part by a passionate romance with a new flame

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: After his baby son is born, chronic underachiever Tom Reilly (Zach Braff) is suddenly forced to grow up and take a job working in his father-in-law's advertising agency after his wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) elects to leave her career as a lawyer. programme.desc: Comedian Jermaine Fowler performs his first ever stand-up special, dissecting his life in hilarious detail from his childhood to dealing with Internet trolls and his "special" brother(n)

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Christmas Eve hijinks put Frank Cross (Bill Murray) in a ghostly time warp in this take-off of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol." Cross, who has made the meteoric rise from the depths of the mailroom to TV network president, is a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over he'll be visited by a maniacal New York cab driver from the past, a present-day fairy who's into pratfalls and, finally, a ghoulish, seven-foot headless messenger from the future(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice(n)

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind(n)

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film(n)

programme.title: IVERSON
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary charting the rise of basketball great Allen Iverson, told largely in his own words. From a turbulent childhood of crushing poverty in Virginia to controversial run-ins with the law to iconic Philadelphia 76ers all star, his audacious rejection of convention and off the court embrace of hip-hop sent shockwaves through the NBA and influenced an entire generation

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: Oosthuizen vs. Johnson (R) (?)
Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars as a hard-bitten Navy S.E.A.L, who is sent into the heart of Africa and finds himself in conflict when he has to choose between following orders or the dictates of his conscience

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Medium Raw
programme.desc: Detective Johnny Morgan finally tracks down the deranged serial killer that kidnapped and murdered his sister 20 years earlier but is disappointed when the fiend receives life imprisonment in an insane asylum instead of the death penalty. Visiting the prisoner intending to exact revenge, Johnny is instead trapped inside the institution when a power outage frees the inmates and seals off all escape routes. Andrew Cymek, John Rhys-Davies and William B. Davis star in this horror thriller

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson(n)

programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: Richard Farnsworth and Sissy Spacek star in director David Lynch's tale of Alvin Straight, an elderly man who makes a long journey by lawn mower to mend a relationship with his estranged brother

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: Richard Farnsworth and Sissy Spacek star in director David Lynch's tale of Alvin Straight, an elderly man who makes a long journey by lawn mower to mend a relationship with his estranged brother(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson(n)

programme.title: Rugrats In Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Finsters and the Pickles travel to the City of Lights, where Chucky hopes that his dad Chas will find him a new mother while he repairs the malfunctioning reptiles at a European dinosaur theme park. Based on the beloved Nickelodeon series, this animated family adventure features the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Susan Sarandon, Michael Bell, Cheryl Chase, John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, Mako, Casey Kasem and Tim Curry(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw(n)

Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel

programme.title: The Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Three Iraq War veterans embark on a stateside road trip full of startling revelations and emotional catharsis in this comedy drama starring Tim Robbins, Michael Pena and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: Manglehorn
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Al Pacino stars as a reclusive small town locksmith who has never quite recovered from losing the love of his life but as he begins to forge tenuous human connections and approach the possibility of new love, he finds himself at a crossroads between the past and present. Also stars Academy Award® winner Holly Hunter

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Coffee and Cigarettes
programme.desc: Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett, Steve Buscemi, Iggy Pop, Jack and Meg White, Tom Waits, Steven Wright and Roberto Benigni are part of the eccentric cast appearing in this series of 11 wry, short films by filmmaker Jim Jarmusch, shot over a period of 17 years. Linking this lyrical and leisurely collection of black-and-white vignettes is the ubiquitous presence of a cup of joe and a ciggie, some great background music (often heard from diner jukeboxes) and an inextinguishable sense of cool. "Plays like a haunting concept album" - "Rolling Stone."

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: Manglehorn
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner Al Pacino stars as a reclusive small town locksmith who has never quite recovered from losing the love of his life but as he begins to forge tenuous human connections and approach the possibility of new love, he finds himself at a crossroads between the past and present. Also stars Academy Award® winner Holly Hunter

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: After his baby son is born, chronic underachiever Tom Reilly (Zach Braff) is suddenly forced to grow up and take a job working in his father-in-law's advertising agency after his wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) elects to leave her career as a lawyer. One little wrinkle: Sofia's seemingly perfect, wheelchair-bound ex-boyfriend (Jason Bateman) also works for the same company, and immediately sets about undermining Tom at every turn. Charles Grodin, Mia Farrow and Donal Logue costar in this comedy cult favorite

programme.title: Spring Breakers

Stars Selena Gomez and James Franco

programme.title: Scorned
programme.desc: When a woman discovers her boyfriend is cheating on her with her best friend, she plans a romantic weekend getaway for just the three of them, complete with terror, torture and twisted psychosexual games. Stars AnnaLynne McCord and Billy Zane

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A mysterious blonde woman kills a frustrated housewife and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder. Stars Michael Caine, Nancy Allen and David Margulies. Directed by Brian De Palma

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs

programme.title: Good Advice
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as a successful stockbroker who, after losing his fortune on a bad stock tip, decides to secretly write into his ex-girlfriend's less-than-successful advice column, setting of a romantic chain of events. Also stars Denise Richards and Rosanna Arquette

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: Factory Girl
programme.desc: Sienna Miller stars in this absorbing biography of Edie Sedgwick, the socialite who dropped out of college, befriended counterculture artist Andy Warhol, had an affair with a legendary musician, and used her stunning good looks to become a successful cover girl - until mental illness and drugs destroyed her life. Guy Pearce, Hayden Christensen, Illeana Douglas, Jimmy Fallon and Mena Suvari costar in this riveting look back at a fascinating era from director George Hickenlooper(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years(n)

programme.title: Sunshine
programme.desc: Ralph Fiennes ("Schindler's List," "Quiz Show") stars in this sprawling epic as three different men in successive generations of a Hungarian Jewish family struggling through the political and social upheaval of World War II, the rise of communism, and the Hungarian Revolution. Rachel Weisz, James Frain, Jennifer Ehle, Molly Parker, William Hurt and Rosemary Harris costar(n)

programme.title: Strip Club Slayer
programme.desc: When a strip club goer is killed, the dancers hire a bouncer to protect themselves. As the sexual tension grows between one of the women and the bouncer, the mystery of the dangerous killer unravels(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Veracity
programme.desc: Two teenage girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves in this short film directed by Seith Mann and written by Janaya Greene(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel(n)

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else(n)

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: The Opposite Sex
programme.desc: Musical remake of the Broadway hit "The Women," about a seemingly happily married singer who loses her husband to a gold digger, but then decides, against the advice of her catty friends, to try and win him back

programme.title: Our Miss Brooks
programme.desc: Eve Arden as a teacher with romantic and professional problems. Conklin: Gale Gordon. Nolan: Don Porter. Boynton: Robert Rockwell. Denton: Richard Crenna. Based on the TV series. Fairly amusing fun, thanks to Miss Arden. Al Lewis directed

programme.title: Please Don't Eat the Daisies
programme.desc: Jean Kerr's best seller was the basis for this romp about a New York City theater critic, his plucky wife and their four prankish children who move from the hectic core of the Big Apple to a run-down house in the hushed suburbs

programme.title: Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: Judy Holliday has a field day re-creating her Broadway role as an answering-service operator who makes a personal connection in the social lives of her customers, one of whom she falls for. An Oscar-nominated Musical Score includes "Just in Time" and "The Party's Over

programme.title: That Man's Here Again
programme.desc: A homeless gal is befriended by an elevator operator

programme.title: Spring Madness
programme.desc: Shenanigans involving a Harvard youth with wanderlust and a local college student vying for the affection of the same woman

programme.title: Johnny Belinda
programme.desc: Jane Wyman won an Oscar for her portrayal of a deaf woman living a hardscrabble life in a Nova Scotia fishing village, where she is taught to communicate by a young doctor. Later, she is raped by a local lout, and charged when he is later found murdered. The film was nominated for 12 Oscars, including Best Picture, Director (Jean Negulesco) and Actor (Lew Ayres), but Wyman's was the only win

programme.title: Never Fear
programme.desc: A newly engaged dancer, stricken with polio, tries to adjust to its effects on her life

programme.title: A Summer Place
programme.desc: A wealthy family vacationing at an island resort off of Maine experience the pangs of young love for the daughter and a rekindled romance between the father and a former flame

programme.title: Splendor in the Grass
programme.desc: In the 1920s, a working-class high-school girl and the son of a wealthy family fall in love, but end up involved with other people, leading her to attempt suicide and spend time in a mental institution

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A poor factory worker, employed by a wealthy uncle, meets and falls in love with an heiress, but his happiness and promising future are jeopardized by a previous affair with a coworker he impregnated. A Best Picture nominee that was adapted from Theodore Dreiser's best seller "An American Tragedy

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: An adaptation of John Steinbeck's 1955 novel is set in 1917 California, and stars James Dean as a wild and unloved young man from a strife-torn family who is at odds with his quiet, studious brother and puritanical father. Jo Van Fleet won a Supporting Actress Oscar as the boys' estranged mother

programme.title: Bigger Than Life
programme.desc: The story of a physically ill man (James Mason) who experiences a drastic personality change after using an experimental wonder drug. Lou: Barbara Rush. Wally: Walter Matthau. Norton: Robert Simon. Unusual, dramatic and extremely well-acted. Direction by Nicholas Ray

programme.title: Come Back, Little Sheba
programme.desc: William Inge's hit, with Oscar winner Shirley Booth as the housewife and Burt Lancaster as her alcoholic husband. Turk: Richard Jaeckel. Marie: Terry Moore. Ed: Philip Ober. Elmo: Edwin Max. Mrs. Coffman: Lisa Golm. Strongly directed by Daniel Mann. James Wong Howe photography

programme.title: About Mrs. Leslie
programme.desc: A woman (Shirley Booth) recalls her back-street love affair with an industrialist (Robert Ryan). Nadine: Marjie Millar. Lan: Alex Nicol. Pixie: Eilene Janssen. Harry: Sammy White. Pixie's Mother: Ellen Corby. Poole: James Bell. Finley: Philip Ober. Well-played soap opera. Directed by Daniel Mann

programme.title: The Sandpiper
programme.desc: Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton in a love story about a "free soul" artist. and a married minister who runs a private school that her troubled 9-year-old son has been court-ordered to attend

programme.title: Now, Voyager
programme.desc: A neurotic, unmarried woman chafing under a domineering mother is helped by an eminent psychiatrist, who instills self-confidence in her, which is put to the test when she falls in love with an unhappily married man. Bette Davis was nominated for Best Actress as the daughter and Gladys Cooper got a Best Supporting Actress nod as her mother. The film's title is from a line in Walt Whitman's "Leaves of Grass." (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: Four Daughters
programme.desc: A musician lives a happy, orderly life with his four, musically talented daughters, each of whom has a very respectable suitor. Their quiet existence is turned upside down, however, when a slovenly, jaded composer shows up

programme.title: Mrs. Parkington
programme.desc: A Nevada maid falls in love with and marries an ambitious mine owner, but when he moves them to a palatial estate in New York, they are spurned by Manhattan society. Greer Garson was nominated for Best Actress as the title character, while Agnes Moorehead received a nod as Best Supporting Actress

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Franklin's little sister, Aretha (Jamia Simone Nash), is a terrific singer, but he doesn't exactly brag about her. Meanwhile, Jay finds a photo of Michael's former girlfriend among his memorabilia. Why, she wonders, has he saved it? Actually, “wonders” doesn't adequately describe her reaction. “We have a crisis in our marriage,” she fumes. Franklin: Noah Gray-Cabey. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay decides she wants to share Michael's golf experience. She doesn't want to play---just follow him around the course. Meanwhile, Jr. decides he wants to go to college (because Vanessa's going), but he's stuck on the college-application essay. So he asks Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey) for help. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Claire and Tony (Andrew McFarlane) announce that they are going to have sex to Michael and Jay, who react as expected. But after calming down they strategize on how to stop the impending tryst. “We'll scare the pants off them,” Michael tells Jay, “Well, not the pants.” Meanwhile, Jr. gets Kady to think that she made him sick, so she's at his beck and call. But Franklin (Noah Gray-Cabey) smells a rat. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Claire has been asked to the senior prom, but Michael won't let her go. Their compromise: Michael and Jay will chaperone. Suffice it to say that Jay thinks more of the plan than Claire does (or than Michael does, at first). Meanwhile, Jr's rehabbing an old car and he wants Michael to pay for it. Michael agrees, but that isn't necessarily good news for Jr. Donovan: Roshawn Franklin. (repeat)

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Sekretne smaki Paryża Rachel Khoo
programme.desc: Widzowie poznają różne dania kuchni francuskiej. Autorka poradników kulinarnych, właścicielka najmniejszej restauracji w Paryżu i prezenterka, Rachel Khoo, przedstawia ciekawe przepisy na potrawy typowe dla kraju nad Loarą. Wykorzystuje swoją wiedzę, jaką zdobyła podczas nauki we francuskiej szkole dla kucharzy, Le Cordon Bleu. Rachel przyrządza tradycyjne dania, a także eksperymentuje, łącząc odmienne smaki i tradycje kulinarne. Odwiedza również mało znane zakątki francuskiej stolicy, w których można kupić rzadko spotykane artykuły spożywcze

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Twórcy programu dzielą się poradami dotyczącymi dnia codziennego. Omawiają rozmaite życiowe problemy, prezentując zabawne i pouczające nagrania. Rozmawiają też z znanymi gośćmi o ich sposobach radzenia sobie z wyzwaniami i wpadkami. Każdy odcinek to spora dawka śmiechu, lecz także porcja ciekawostek ze świata nauki. Dzięki programowi widzowie dowiedzą się, jak nie dać się oszukać przy wynajmie mieszkania czy zakupie używanego auta, jak zrobić wrażenie na przyszłym pracodawcy. Poznają też niezastąpione metody na uciążliwego sąsiada, dowiedzą się też, dlaczego nie należy zamawiać spaghetti na pierwszej randce. Wśród gości, którzy podzielą się swoimi zabawnymi doświadczeniami znajdą się Krzysztof Skiba, Grażyna Wolszczak czy Zygmunt Chajzer czy Joanna Koroniewska

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: 20-letnia Helena z Warszawy w wieku 17 lat przeniosła się z Ukrainy do Polski. Całe życie marzyła, żeby uciec z domu od despotycznego ojca. Dostała się na studia dziennikarstwa, dostała również stypendium. Nie odnalazła się jednak zupełnie w środowisku studenckim, nie miała koleżanek, czuła się samotna w związku z czym porzuciła studia. Helena ma trudności ze znalezieniem dla siebie miejsca i zajęcia. Jak sama mówi, to przez to, że się nie uśmiecha. Uważa też, że koleżanki z pracy zazdroszczą jej tego, że jest atrakcyjna. Dziewczyna czuje, że nigdzie nie pasuje, a wszyscy ją odtrącają

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Historie niezadowolonych z siebie i swojego życia kobiet, które pragną pozytywnej zmiany. Bohaterki programu opowiedzą o swoich problemach, trudnej przeszłości i źródłach obecnej, złej sytuacji. Następnie przejdą niezwykłą metamorfozę pod okiem trenerki rozwoju osobistego Joanny Godeckiej, stylistki i wizażystki Wiganny Papiny oraz fryzjera Andrzeja Frani. Dzięki nim staną się pewne swojej wartości, uporządkują panujący do tej pory w życiu chaos i poczują się piękniejsze. Odmienione stawią czoła codziennym przeciwnościom, z którymi do tej pory nie radziły sobie najlepiej. Ich szczerych i wzruszających zwierzeń wysłucha gospodyni programu Katarzyna Cichopek

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Kobieta za kierownicą stała się bohaterką wielu dowcipów, a w brzydkiej części użytkowników dróg w najlepszym wypadku budzi uśmiech politowania. W programie panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiądą na miejscu kierowcy. Pasażerami, a jednocześnie instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para będzie miała trzy dni na uzupełnienie braków i dogłębne poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem. Nie zawsze będzie różowo - widzowie będą świadkami wybuchów złości, łez porażki i słownych potyczek. Trudy nauki wydobędą bowiem z bohaterów prawdziwe uczucia, które żywią oni swoich połówek. Ale na tym nie koniec. Każda para przejdzie dodatkowo test końcowy. Uczestnicy, którzy najlepiej poradzą sobie z zadaniem wyjadą z programu z atrakcyjną nagrodą. Emocji na pewno nie zabraknie

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Kolejna odsłona serialu o perypetiach pięknej modelki Deb, która zginęła w wypadku samochodowym i powróciła na ziemię w ciele pulchnej prawniczki Jane Bingum (Brooke Elliott). Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Deb, dla której przed wypadkiem świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, przechodzi równie spektakularną wewnętrzną metamorfozę. Grayson trafia do szpitala z raną postrzałową. Jane w pojedynkę angażuje się w kampanię przeciwko zakładowi przemysłowemu. Szkodliwe dymy i substancje wywołują wśród wielu osób liczne dolegliwości

programme.title: Jasnowidząca Wanga
programme.desc: Historia życia Wangeliji Pandewej Dimitrowej słynnej niewidomej bułgarskiej mistyczki i znachorki, która przewidziała wiele ważnych i przełomowych dla świata wydarzeń. Wśród jej przepowiedni są m.in.: wybuch II wojny światowej i data dojścia Hitlera do władzy, śmierć Stalina, zatonięcie okrętu podwodnego Kursk czy atak terrorystów na World Trade Center w Nowym Jorku. Serial przybliża postać tej niezwykłej, posiadającej wyjątkową moc kobiety. Lata 1931-1938. Wangę odwiedza tajemnicza postać i obiecuje, że będzie jej pomagać. Podpowiada, za pomocą których ziół i kwiatów można uzdrawiać. Dzięki temu Wandze udaje się ocalić swojego brata

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Seria opowiada o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.sub-title: Kabaret Koń Polski, z gościnnym udziałem Kabaretu Czesuaf i Kabaretu Chyba
programme.desc: Kabaret Koń Polski w programie przygotowanym specjalnie z myślą o widzach Nowej TV. Pochodząca z Koszalina grupa regularnie pojawia się w telewizji. W swoich skeczach wyśmiewa aktualne wydarzenia polityczne i społeczne. Satyrycy w ciągu swojej kariery stworzyli wiele charakterystycznych postaci, jednak najbardziej rozpoznawalni pozostają Marian i Hela - ulubione małżeństwo fanów kabaretu. Tym razem grupie towarzyszy Kabaret Czesuaf, zespół założony przez trzech poznaniaków, którzy w swoim repertuarze mają zarówno skecze, jak i przezabawne piosenki. Oprócz tego na scenie pojawi się Kabaret Chyba, zdobywca najważniejszych nagród w Polsce. Grupa wystąpi z programem "Chyba sobie żarty robi". To okazja, by obejrzeć słynnego "Organistę" i występ powolnego Pana Maczka

programme.title: Party Mix
programme.desc: Weekendowe pasmo muzyczne, w którym jego twórcy zaprezentują starannie wyselekcjonowany zbiór utworów w sam raz na taneczny, imprezowy wieczór. Widzowie usłyszą przeboje, które cieszą się największą popularnością w różnych częściach świata. Nie zabraknie najsłynniejszych hitów artystów polskich i gwiazd z zagranicy

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego

programme.title: Sekretne smaki Paryża Rachel Khoo
programme.desc: Widzowie poznają różne dania kuchni francuskiej. Autorka poradników kulinarnych, właścicielka najmniejszej restauracji w Paryżu i prezenterka, Rachel Khoo, przedstawia ciekawe przepisy na potrawy typowe dla kraju nad Loarą. Wykorzystuje swoją wiedzę, jaką zdobyła podczas nauki we francuskiej szkole dla kucharzy, Le Cordon Bleu. Rachel przyrządza tradycyjne dania, a także eksperymentuje, łącząc odmienne smaki i tradycje kulinarne. Odwiedza również mało znane zakątki francuskiej stolicy, w których można kupić rzadko spotykane artykuły spożywcze

programme.title: Taka sytuacja
programme.desc: Twórcy programu dzielą się poradami dotyczącymi dnia codziennego. Omawiają rozmaite życiowe problemy, prezentując zabawne i pouczające nagrania. Rozmawiają też z znanymi gośćmi o ich sposobach radzenia sobie z wyzwaniami i wpadkami. Każdy odcinek to spora dawka śmiechu, lecz także porcja ciekawostek ze świata nauki. Dzięki programowi widzowie dowiedzą się, jak nie dać się oszukać przy wynajmie mieszkania czy zakupie używanego auta, jak zrobić wrażenie na przyszłym pracodawcy. Poznają też niezastąpione metody na uciążliwego sąsiada, dowiedzą się też, dlaczego nie należy zamawiać spaghetti na pierwszej randce. Wśród gości, którzy podzielą się swoimi zabawnymi doświadczeniami znajdą się Krzysztof Skiba, Grażyna Wolszczak czy Zygmunt Chajzer czy Joanna Koroniewska

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: 20-letnia Helena z Warszawy w wieku 17 lat przeniosła się z Ukrainy do Polski. Całe życie marzyła, żeby uciec z domu od despotycznego ojca. Dostała się na studia dziennikarstwa, dostała również stypendium. Nie odnalazła się jednak zupełnie w środowisku studenckim, nie miała koleżanek, czuła się samotna w związku z czym porzuciła studia. Helena ma trudności ze znalezieniem dla siebie miejsca i zajęcia. Jak sama mówi, to przez to, że się nie uśmiecha. Uważa też, że koleżanki z pracy zazdroszczą jej tego, że jest atrakcyjna. Dziewczyna czuje, że nigdzie nie pasuje, a wszyscy ją odtrącają

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Historie niezadowolonych z siebie i swojego życia kobiet, które pragną pozytywnej zmiany. Bohaterki programu opowiedzą o swoich problemach, trudnej przeszłości i źródłach obecnej, złej sytuacji. Następnie przejdą niezwykłą metamorfozę pod okiem trenerki rozwoju osobistego Joanny Godeckiej, stylistki i wizażystki Wiganny Papiny oraz fryzjera Andrzeja Frani. Dzięki nim staną się pewne swojej wartości, uporządkują panujący do tej pory w życiu chaos i poczują się piękniejsze. Odmienione stawią czoła codziennym przeciwnościom, z którymi do tej pory nie radziły sobie najlepiej. Ich szczerych i wzruszających zwierzeń wysłucha gospodyni programu Katarzyna Cichopek

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Kobieta za kierownicą stała się bohaterką wielu dowcipów, a w brzydkiej części użytkowników dróg w najlepszym wypadku budzi uśmiech politowania. W programie panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiądą na miejscu kierowcy. Pasażerami, a jednocześnie instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para będzie miała trzy dni na uzupełnienie braków i dogłębne poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem. Nie zawsze będzie różowo - widzowie będą świadkami wybuchów złości, łez porażki i słownych potyczek. Trudy nauki wydobędą bowiem z bohaterów prawdziwe uczucia, które żywią oni swoich połówek. Ale na tym nie koniec. Każda para przejdzie dodatkowo test końcowy. Uczestnicy, którzy najlepiej poradzą sobie z zadaniem wyjadą z programu z atrakcyjną nagrodą. Emocji na pewno nie zabraknie

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Kolejna odsłona serialu o perypetiach pięknej modelki Deb, która zginęła w wypadku samochodowym i powróciła na ziemię w ciele pulchnej prawniczki Jane Bingum (Brooke Elliott). Pod nową postacią dwie osobowości kobiety muszą nauczyć się koegzystować. Deb, dla której przed wypadkiem świat koncentrował się wokół nieskazitelnego wyglądu, przechodzi równie spektakularną wewnętrzną metamorfozę. Grayson trafia do szpitala z raną postrzałową. Jane w pojedynkę angażuje się w kampanię przeciwko zakładowi przemysłowemu. Szkodliwe dymy i substancje wywołują wśród wielu osób liczne dolegliwości

programme.title: Jasnowidząca Wanga
programme.desc: Historia życia Wangeliji Pandewej Dimitrowej słynnej niewidomej bułgarskiej mistyczki i znachorki, która przewidziała wiele ważnych i przełomowych dla świata wydarzeń. Wśród jej przepowiedni są m.in.: wybuch II wojny światowej i data dojścia Hitlera do władzy, śmierć Stalina, zatonięcie okrętu podwodnego Kursk czy atak terrorystów na World Trade Center w Nowym Jorku. Serial przybliża postać tej niezwykłej, posiadającej wyjątkową moc kobiety. Lata 1931-1938. Wangę odwiedza tajemnicza postać i obiecuje, że będzie jej pomagać. Podpowiada, za pomocą których ziół i kwiatów można uzdrawiać. Dzięki temu Wandze udaje się ocalić swojego brata

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Seria opowiada o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Nowa Rewia Kabaretowa
programme.sub-title: Kabaret Koń Polski, z gościnnym udziałem Kabaretu Czesuaf i Kabaretu Chyba
programme.desc: Kabaret Koń Polski w programie przygotowanym specjalnie z myślą o widzach Nowej TV. Pochodząca z Koszalina grupa regularnie pojawia się w telewizji. W swoich skeczach wyśmiewa aktualne wydarzenia polityczne i społeczne. Satyrycy w ciągu swojej kariery stworzyli wiele charakterystycznych postaci, jednak najbardziej rozpoznawalni pozostają Marian i Hela - ulubione małżeństwo fanów kabaretu. Tym razem grupie towarzyszy Kabaret Czesuaf, zespół założony przez trzech poznaniaków, którzy w swoim repertuarze mają zarówno skecze, jak i przezabawne piosenki. Oprócz tego na scenie pojawi się Kabaret Chyba, zdobywca najważniejszych nagród w Polsce. Grupa wystąpi z programem "Chyba sobie żarty robi". To okazja, by obejrzeć słynnego "Organistę" i występ powolnego Pana Maczka

programme.title: The Worst Witch
programme.desc: Mildred's having fun jumping high into the air with Enid - using pirated magic to make the grass bouncy. Maud's getting fed up with Enid constantly distracting Mildred - Maud knows Mildred needs to knuckle down if she's going to stand a chance at the academy and can't bear the thought of losing her. Mildred receives a singing teddy from home and it makes her feel homesick. When Mildred looks to Maud for help in Miss Gullet's transformations class, Maud doesn't bail her out and Mildred turns Ethel into a pig instead of a mouse into frog. She doesn't even manage to turn Ethel back successfully - she still has a pig's snout! Mildred receives a harsh warning from Miss Hardbroom who threatens expulsion if she can't perform the spell correctly. Mildred feels fed up with all the rules of school and always being the worst witch. It's the final straw, she wants to go home. Drusilla intercepts her leaving, telling her that Maud and Enid are fighting. But it's a trick, and Mildred finds herself facing Ethel. As revenge for still having a pig snout, Ethel turns Mildred into a frog and throws her out of the window

programme.title: The Worst Witch
programme.desc: Everyone's surprised to hear the Great Wizard is making an unexpected visit to Cackle's Academy. He's had a tip off that the school is going rapidly downhill and it looks like non-magical Mildred is at the heart of the problems. Miss Cackle (really Agatha) refuses to expel Mildred and waxes lyrical about her. The Great Wizard insists that Mildred should perform a magical display to prove herself. Creative Mildred conducts a magical potions choir, but it ends in disaster leaving Miss Cackle on thin ice. To everyone's surprise, Miss Cackle (Agatha) makes Mildred lead a broomstick display. Mildred works out that Agatha is impersonating Miss Cackle but has to go ahead with the display - not realising Ethel had put a spell on the broomstick. Mildred begs Maud to find the real Miss Cackle, so while Mildred and Enid are in peril in the air, Maud battles her way up to Miss Cackle's room to find her under an entrancement spell. Just as Mildred and Enid start to plummet, the real Miss Cackle saves them. The Great Wizard has to eat his words - Mildred is a good witch and deserves her place in the school
